app.title: Limit Checker App
description: This is Basecamp proxy for NASA's Limit Checker App. This repo augments
the LC App repo so LC can be integrated with Basecamp. The 'cfs' and
'requires' JSON objects are populated in lc.json
developer-notes: Need to understand the new workflow. How are the config/default_*.h
files are used? Should the default files be overwritten or should the proxy
header files be written in fsw/inc? What is the correct way to manage EDS
